# TechNick.AI

> Personal and professional site of Nick Sullivan, a heart-centered AI entrepreneur and technologist in Austin, TX. Silicon Valley CTO building ethical AI that enhances human potential.

Features Nick's journey from early challenges to Silicon Valley success, the TechNickAI philosophy (heart-centered Ikigai), open source projects including MCP Hubby, claude_telemetry, heart-centered-prompts, and ai-coding-config, plus opportunities for mentorship, speaking, advisory work, and collaboration.

## Site Pages

- [Home](index.html): Complete profile including about, philosophy, featured creations, values, and ways to connect
- [Code Forge](code-forge/index.html): Open source projects showcase with detailed descriptions and integrations

## Open Source Projects

- [MCP Hubby](https://mcphubby.ai): Production MCP gateway with 95% context reduction through progressive disclosure
- [claude_telemetry](https://github.com/TechNickAI/claude_telemetry): Observability wrapper for Claude Code with OTEL integration
- [heart-centered-prompts](https://github.com/technickai/heart-centered-prompts): Revolutionary AI system prompts using unity consciousness
- [ai-coding-config](https://github.com/TechNickAI/ai-coding-config): Claude Code plugin marketplace and Cursor configuration library
- [AICodebot](https://github.com/TechNickAI/AICodeBot): Revolutionary terminal-based AI coding assistant (retired, pre-dated modern IDE assistants)
- [TeslaBot](https://github.com/gorillamania/teslabot): Smart automation for Tesla vehicles via Tessie API

## External Resources

- [HeartCentered.AI](https://heartcentered.ai/): Philosophy and approach to heart-centered technology
- [GitHub Portfolio](https://github.com/TechNickAI): Complete open source contributions
- [LinkedIn Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nicksullivan): Professional background and connections
- [Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/TechNickAI): Updates and AI insights
- [Substack](https://technickai.substack.com/): Writing and long-form content

## Project Documentation

- [README](README.md): Project overview, tech stack, and deployment information
- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): Essential project context for AI coding assistants

- Advisory Services: `nick@technick.ai?subject=Advisory Services`
- Collaboration: `nick@technick.ai?subject=Collaboration Opportunity`

- General Inquiry: `nick@technick.ai?subject=General Inquiry`
